job_details.Functieomschrijving: Your core mission will be to design and implement sophisticated AI systems that operate autonomously, creating scalable solutions that revolutionize business operations without requiring human oversight.
job_details.full_text:
Developer, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Your core mission will be to design and implement sophisticated AI systems that operate autonomously, creating scalable solutions that revolutionize business operations without requiring human oversight.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description is too brief and lacks specific technical details, keywords, or responsibilities that would allow for a definitive classification into ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. It mentions 'sophisticated AI systems' and 'operate autonomously' but does not specify the type of AI, models, or technologies involved, nor does it detail the core tasks or required skills beyond a very high-level, general statement.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'design and implement sophisticated AI systems that operate autonomously' directly relates to the creation and deployment of AI models and systems.
job_tasks.phrase: design and implement sophisticated AI systems that operate autonomously

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'creating scalable solutions that revolutionize business operations' implies the development of software or systems that can be deployed and impact business processes.
job_tasks.phrase: creating scalable solutions that revolutionize business operations
